ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) packages fat-free cream cheese, softened
1 (4 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained and chopped
1 (4.25 ounce) can tiny shrimp, drained and chopped
2 tablespoons wasabi paste, or to taste

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese fully at room temperature for smooth mixing
Toast sesame seeds yourself for superior flavor
Chill cheese ball for at least 2 hours before serving
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through creating a smooth, balanced cheese ball with controlled wasabi heat and Asian-inspired flavors.
